page.title: 05LIFE IN N.SCARLE SINCE 1910
page.content: We have been talking to Mr.Wells who is eighty five years old.He says when he was a school boy he played rounders and hopscotch but he never played football.The school did'nt have the big playing field that we have now.There were two doors one for the boys and one for the girls.On the farm he did everything.He has had a milking machine since 1965 but before that all milking was done by hand.He had 4-6 cows which took him 10-15 minutes each to milk.He fed some of the milk to the calves.Mr Croft had the bull it was a Lincoln Red.He worked with everything.He went hunting foxes on a horse and the horse was called Furious. Mr. Wells also had working horses that did the ploughing.
